Left Mouse - Fire rotary cannon
Right Mouse - Fire missile launcher
R - Return to main menu
1 - Upgrade rotary cannon
2 - Upgrade missile launcher
3 - Upgrade energy regeneration
4 - Upgrade armor
5 - Upgrade jumping
6 - Upgrade movement
